016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
019import java.util.Map;
020import static java.util.Map.entry;
021
022/**
023 * An adduct, generally, consists of a sum formula part, an adduct string, the
024 * charge and the charge sign. An example for a valid adduct is : [M+H]1+.
025 *
026 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
027 * @author Nils Hoffmann
028 */
029public final class Adduct {
030
031    private String sumFormula;
032    private String adductString;
033    private int charge;
034    private int chargeSign;
035
036    public static final Map<String, ElementTable> ADDUCTS = Map.ofEntries(
037            entry("+H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 1))),
038            entry("+2H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 2))),
039            entry("+3H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 3))),
040            entry("+4H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 4))),
041            entry("-H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, -1))),
042            entry("-2H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, -2))),
043            entry("-3H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, -3))),
044            entry("-4H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, -4))),
045            entry("+H-H2O", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, -1), Map.entry(Element.O, -1))),
046            entry("+NH4", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.N, 1), Map.entry(Element.H, 4))),
047            entry("+Cl", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.Cl, 1))),
048            entry("+HCOO", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 1), Map.entry(Element.C, 1), Map.entry(Element.O, 2))),
049            entry("+CH3COO", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 3), Map.entry(Element.C, 2), Map.entry(Element.O, 2)))
050    );
051
052    public static final Map<String, Integer> ADDUCT_CHARGES = Map.ofEntries(
053            entry("+H", 1),
054            entry("+2H", 2),
055            entry("+3H", 3),
056            entry("+4H", 4),
057            entry("-H", -1),
058            entry("-2H", -2),
059            entry("-3H", -3),
060            entry("-4H", -4),
061            entry("+H-H2O", 1),
062            entry("+NH4", 1),
063            entry("+Cl", -1),
064            entry("+HCOO", -1),
065            entry("+CH3COO", -1)
066    );
067
068    public Adduct(String _sum_formula, String _adduct_string) {
069        this(_sum_formula, _adduct_string, 1, 1);
070
071    }
072
073    public Adduct(String _sum_formula, String _adduct_string, int _charge, int _sign) {
074        sumFormula = _sum_formula;
075        adductString = _adduct_string;
076        charge = _charge;
077        setChargeSign(_sign);
078
079    }
080
081    public void setSumFormula(String sumFormula) {
082        this.sumFormula = sumFormula;
083    }
084
085    public String getSumFormula() {
086        return this.sumFormula;
087    }
088
089    public void setAdductString(String adductString) {
090        this.adductString = adductString;
091    }
092
093    public String getAdductString() {
094        return this.adductString;
095    }
096
097    public void setChargeSign(int _sign) {
098        if (-1 <= _sign && _sign <= 1) {
099            chargeSign = _sign;
100        } else {
101            throw new ConstraintViolationException("Sign can only be -1, 0, or 1");
102        }
103    }
104
105    public int getChargeSign() {
106        return this.chargeSign;
107    }
108
109    public void setCharge(int charge) {
110        if (charge > 0) {
111            this.chargeSign = 1;
112        } else {
113            this.chargeSign = -1;
114        }
115        this.charge = charge;
116    }
117
118    public String getLipidString() {
119        if (charge == 0) {
120            return "[M]";
121        }
122        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
123        sb.append("[M").append(sumFormula).append(adductString).append("]").append(charge).append(((chargeSign > 0) ? "+" : "-"));
124
125        return sb.toString();
126    }
127
128    @JsonIgnore
129    public ElementTable getElements() {
130        ElementTable elements = new ElementTable();
131//        String adduct_name = adductString.substring(1);
132
133        if (ADDUCTS.containsKey(adductString)) {
134            if (ADDUCT_CHARGES.get(adductString) != getCharge()) {
135                throw new ConstraintViolationException("Provided charge '" + getCharge() + "' in contradiction to adduct '" + adductString + "' charge '" + ADDUCT_CHARGES.get(adductString) + "'.");
136            }
137            elements.add(ADDUCTS.get(adductString));
138        } else {
139            throw new ConstraintViolationException("Adduct '" + adductString + "' is unknown.");
140        }
141
142        return elements;
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Returns the positive elementary charge times the charge sign.
147     *
148     * @return the net charge.
149     */
150    public int getCharge() {
151        return charge * chargeSign;
152    }
153}
